name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena
tagline: A Fan Made Battle Network Game.
body:
### Welcome to the page for Megaman Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena
This is a fan made game I created to test out the newly released Unity2D. This also was my first major project using unity.

```
To play check out
[http://protein.mts.uri.edu/MPet/MMBNProj/](http://protein.mts.uri.edu/MPet/MMBNProj/)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
